class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


(This graduate course introduces a variety of research methods and designs used in the field of psychology. Students will interact with faculty from the clinical psychology program and have an opportunity to hear about their current research projects. Critical thinking, conceptualization, and writing skills will be emphasized.)
schedule_location: M 10am-12:30pm in New Psyc Bldg 393 (36 Eagle Ro
